name: get_place_autocomplete_predictions
description: Simulate autocomplete predictions for a given input query.

input.description: The input text used to generate predictions.

inputOffset.description: The character offset in the input string where the prediction should begin.

languageCode.description: The preferred language for the prediction results.

regionCode.description: The Unicode region code used to influence the results.

sessionToken.description: A token for session-scoped billing and grouping of requests.

includeQueryPredictions.description: Whether to include predictions that complete the entire query.

includePureServiceAreaBusinesses.description: Specifies whether to include businesses that only serve a specific area.

includedPrimaryTypes.description: A list of place types to include in the predictions.

includedRegionCodes.description: An array of CLDR region codes to restrict results to.

origin.description: The user's geographic location, specified by floating-point `latitude` and `longitude` values.

radius.description: The radius of the restriction, specified in meters.

locationRestriction.description: A circular area within which to restrict predictions.

name: get_place_details
description: Retrieve detailed information about a place using its resource name, which must be in the format `places/{place_id}`.

name.description: The required resource name of the place, formatted as `places/{place_id}`.

languageCode.description: Preferred language for localized content if available.

sessionToken.description: An autocomplete session token for billing, which must be base64-safe and at most 36 ASCII characters.

regionCode.description: A Unicode CLDR region code to influence localized place details.

name: get_place_photo_media
description: Retrieves photo media using a resource name formatted as `places/{place_id}/photos/{photo_reference}/media`.

name.description: The required resource name of a photo, formatted as `places/{place_id}/photos/{photo_reference}/media`.

maxWidthPx.description: The maximum desired photo width, with a valid range of 1 to 4800.

skipHttpRedirect.description: Specifies whether to skip HTTP redirects and return JSON data; defaults to `False`.

name: search_nearby_places
description: Searches for places by primary type, included or excluded secondary types, display name language code, and a location restriction defined by a center point and radius.

includedPrimaryTypes.description: Restricts results to places that have at least one of the specified primary types, as defined in the list of supported [Place Types](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/places/web-service/place-types).

excludedPrimaryTypes.description: Excludes places that have any of the specified primary types. For a list of valid types, see [Place Types](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/places/web-service/place-types).

includedTypes.description: Restricts results to places that have at least one of the specified types as a primary or secondary type, as defined in the [Place Types list](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/places/web-service/place-types).

excludedTypes.description: Excludes places from the results if they have a primary or secondary type matching any of the specified types, as defined in the official [list of place types](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/places/web-service/place-types).

languageCode.description: The preferred language for the `displayName`, returning only places that have a name in the specified language.

circle.description: A circle that defines the search area.

center.description: The center of the circular restriction.

locationRestriction.description: Restricts the search to a circular area.

maxResultCount.description: The maximum number of places to return, defaulting to 20.

regionCode.description: The Unicode country/region code for the request's origin.

rankPreference.description: Specifies the ranking of results, which must be one of `RANK_PREFERENCE_UNSPECIFIED`, `DISTANCE`, or `POPULARITY`.

routingPreference.description: Specifies how to compute routing summaries, which can be `TRAFFIC_UNAWARE` (ignores traffic for lowest latency), `TRAFFIC_AWARE` (considers traffic with optimizations), or `TRAFFIC_AWARE_OPTIMAL` (fully considers traffic for highest accuracy). Defaults to `TRAFFIC_UNAWARE`.

avoidIndoor.description: Specifies whether to avoid indoor navigation when possible.

avoidHighways.description: Specifies a preference for routes that avoid highways.

routeModifiers.description: Specifies conditions to avoid during routing.

latitude.description: Latitude in degrees, with a range of [-90.0, +90.0].

longitude.description: The longitude in degrees, with a value between -180.0 and 180.0.

origin.description: An override for the polyline's origin.

travelMode.description: The mode of travel, which can be `DRIVE` (default), `BICYCLE` or `WALK` (not supported with `search_along_route_parameters`), or `TWO_WHEELER` (only available in specific countries).

request.description: A dictionary containing the search parameters.

name: search_places_by_text
description: Performs a text-based search for places using optional filters—such as `priceLevels`, `locationBias`, `openNow`, and `minRating`—as defined in the `GoogleMapsPlacesV1SearchTextRequest` schema.

textQuery.description: The required text for the search query.

pageSize.description: Maximum number of results to return.

maxResultCount.description: An alternative to `pageSize` for specifying the maximum number of results to return.

strictTypeFiltering.description: Restricts results to only places where the `primaryType` exactly matches `includedType`. Defaults to `false`.

includedType.description: When `strictTypeFiltering` is `true`, restricts results to places that have at least one of the specified primary or secondary types from the list at https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/places/web-service/place-types.

priceLevels.description: Filters results by one or more of the following price levels: `PRICE_LEVEL_UNSPECIFIED`, `PRICE_LEVEL_FREE`, `PRICE_LEVEL_INEXPENSIVE`, `PRICE_LEVEL_MODERATE`, `PRICE_LEVEL_EXPENSIVE`, or `PRICE_LEVEL_VERY_EXPENSIVE`.

latitude.description: The latitude of the circle's center.

center.description: The required center point of the circle.

radius.description: The radius of the circle in meters; only places within this circle are returned.

latitude.description: The latitude of the southwest corner.

longitude.description: The longitude of the southwest corner.

low.description: The required southwest point of the viewport.

latitude.description: The latitude of the northeast corner.

longitude.description: The longitude of the northeast corner.

high.description: Required. The northeast corner of the viewport.

viewport.description: The required bounding box that defines the rectangle.

rectangle.description: A rectangle representing a geographic area.

locationBias.description: A geographic bias that influences result ordering.

openNow.description: If `true`, returns only places that are currently open. Defaults to `false`.

minRating.description: Restricts results to places with a rating greater than or equal to this value.

pageToken.description: A token from a previous search to retrieve the next set of results.

includePureServiceAreaBusinesses.description: Indicates whether to include pure service area businesses, defaulting to `true`.

circle.description: A circular restriction for the search.

latitude.description: The latitude of the center point.

longitude.description: The longitude of the center point.

center.description: The center of the circular area to search within.

radius.description: Radius of the circle in meters.

locationRestriction.description: Restricts the search to a circular area.

languageCode.description: The preferred language for the `displayName`, used to return only places that have a name in the specified language.

regionCode.description: The Unicode country/region code of the request origin.

encodedPolyline.description: A route's encoded polyline string, defined by the [Google Polyline Algorithm](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/utilities/polylinealgorithm).

polyline.description: A required polyline defining the route.

searchAlongRouteParameters.description: A precalculated polyline route used to bias search results along a path, rather than within a general area.

connectorTypes.description:
A list of preferred EV connector types that filters out places lacking any of the specified connectors. Valid values include:
- `EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED`: Unspecified connector.
- `EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_OTHER`: Other connector types.
- `EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_J1772`: J1772 type 1 connector.
- `EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_TYPE_2`: IEC 62196 type 2 connector (MENNEKES).
- `EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_CHADEMO`: CHAdeMO connector.
- `EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_CCS_COMBO_1`: Combined Charging System, type-1 J-1772.
- `EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_CCS_COMBO_2`: Combined Charging System, type-2 Mennekes.
- `EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_TESLA`: Generic Tesla connector, which may vary by region (e.g., NACS, CCS2, GB/T).
- `EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED_GB_T`: GB/T standard connector (China).
- `EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED_WALL_OUTLET`: Unspecified wall outlet.
- `EV_CONNECTOR_TYPE_NACS`: North American Charging System (NACS), SAE J3400 standard.

minimumChargingRateKw.description: The minimum charging rate in kilowatts, which excludes places with a lower rate.

evOptions.description: Filtering options specific to electric vehicles (EVs).

routingPreference.description: Specifies the routing computation preference: `TRAFFIC_UNAWARE` ignores live traffic for lowest latency, `TRAFFIC_AWARE` considers traffic with optimizations, or `TRAFFIC_AWARE_OPTIMAL` fully considers traffic for the highest latency. Defaults to `TRAFFIC_UNAWARE` if unspecified.

avoidFerries.description: Specifies that the route should avoid ferries when possible.

avoidIndoor.description: Specifies to avoid indoor navigation if an alternative route is available.

avoidHighways.description: Specifies whether to avoid highways when possible.

latitude.description: Latitude in degrees, with a range of [-90.0, +90.0].

longitude.description: Longitude in degrees, with a range of [-180.0, 180.0].

origin.description: An override for the polyline origin.

travelMode.description: The mode of travel, which can be `"DRIVE"`, `"BICYCLE"`, `"WALK"`, or `"TWO_WHEELER"`, and defaults to `"DRIVE"` if unspecified. Note that `"BICYCLE"` and `"WALK"` are not supported with `search_along_route_parameters`, and `"TWO_WHEELER"` is only available in specific countries.

rankPreference.description: Specifies the ranking of the results, which must be one of `RANK_PREFERENCE_UNSPECIFIED`, `DISTANCE`, or `POPULARITY`.

request.description: A dictionary containing the parameters for the text search.
